Plot: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.
Title: Don Juan DeMarco
Writer: Lord Byron (character Don Juan), Jeremy Leven
Actors: Marlon Brando, Johnny Depp, Faye Dunaway, Géraldine Pailhas
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 3 nominations.
